import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { UserContext } from '../../UserContext'; import './navbar.scss'; function Navbar() { let user = useContext(UserContext) let username if(localStorage.getItem("accessToken") !== "" ){ // user = JSON.parse(user) username = user.name } return (
  • Menu

  • { localStorage.setItem("accessToken", "") localStorage.setItem("currentUser", {auth: null}) }} href="/">Log Out

); } export default Navbar;
